body:
The full logs give some more context for the error message:

```
                     Generating C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/util/version_info.cc (TaskId:136)
                     Traceback (most recent call last): (TaskId:136)
                       File "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.py", line 266, in <module> (TaskId:136)
                         raw_generate(args.raw_generate) (TaskId:136)
                       File "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.py", line 230, in raw_generate (TaskId:136)
                         git_version = get_git_version(".") (TaskId:136)
                       File "C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/git/gen_git_source.py", line 156, in get_git_version (TaskId:136)
                         str("--work-tree=" + git_base_path), "describe", "--long", "--tags" (TaskId:136)
                       File "C:\Users\Administrator\Anaconda3\lib\subprocess.py", line 626, in check_output (TaskId:136)
                         **kwargs).stdout (TaskId:136)
                       File "C:\Users\Administrator\Anaconda3\lib\subprocess.py", line 693, in run (TaskId:136)
                         with Popen(*popenargs, **kwargs) as process: (TaskId:136)
                       File "C:\Users\Administrator\Anaconda3\lib\subprocess.py", line 947, in __init__ (TaskId:136)
                         restore_signals, start_new_session) (TaskId:136)
                       File "C:\Users\Administrator\Anaconda3\lib\subprocess.py", line 1224, in _execute_child (TaskId:136)
                         startupinfo) (TaskId:136)
                     FileNotFoundError: [WinError 2] The system cannot find the file specified (TaskId:136)
03:14:03.769     3>C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft.Cpp\v4.0\V140\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(171,5): error MSB6006: "cmd.exe" exited with code 1. [C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build\tf_core_framework.vcxproj]
```

In this case, it looks like `git` can't be found in your `%PATH%`. Can you check that it is possible to run the command-line `git` tool from the command prompt where you started the build?
